question: Q1. Choose the correct way of creating an object of the below class.
Q2. Attribute of an object can include information about_____.
Q3. The keyword used to create a new object in Java is ___.
Q4. An object is created at __ time in Java.
Q5. Choose the correct statements about choosing a name for a class in Java.

answers.a: The class name can start with only a letter or underscore or dollar sign
answers.b: The class name can contain numbers
answers.c: The class name can not start with a number
